sentences.sentence: It's important to stock up on some things while waiting out Covid-19.
But hoarding unnecessary items can deplete the supply for everyone else.It's important to stock up on some things while waiting out Covid-19.
But hoarding unnecessary items can deplete the supply for everyone else.Tweetsandvideosof people panic-buying toilet paper are proliferating on social media.
Yes, being prepared for a possible quarantine is smart.
But the above video explains why overbuying certain items is not.

An excess of toilet paper will not help protect you against Covid-19, but it will cause a run on supplies that keeps others from getting what they might need.Adam Westbrook(@AdamWestbrook) is a producer with Opinion Video.PHOTO: (PHOTOGRAPH BY The New York Times FOR THE NEW YORK TIMES)

documents.result_message: Our detector is highly confident that the text is written entirely by a human.
documents.inputText: It’s important to stock up on some things while waiting out Covid-19. But hoarding unnecessary items can deplete the supply for everyone else.It’s important to stock up on some things while waiting out Covid-19. But hoarding unnecessary items can deplete the supply for everyone else.Tweetsandvideosof people panic-buying toilet paper are proliferating on social media. Yes, being prepared for a possible quarantine is smart. But the above video explains why overbuying certain items is not. An excess of toilet paper will not help protect you against Covid-19, but it will cause a run on supplies that keeps others from getting what they might need.Adam Westbrook(@AdamWestbrook) is a producer with Opinion Video.PHOTO:  (PHOTOGRAPH BY The New York Times FOR THE NEW YORK TIMES)
